snippet: Immigration and health authorities will open a shelter at Fort Sill, an Army base in Lawton, for unaccompanied minors caught crossing the border illegally.
abstract: Immigration and health authorities will open a shelter at Fort Sill Army base in Lawton, Okla, for unaccompanied minors caught crossing the South Texas border illegally; authorities also set up temporary holding cells in Nogales, Ariz, to process the youths for deportation proceedings.
lead_paragraph: Immigration and health authorities will open a shelter at Fort Sill, an Army base in Lawton, for unaccompanied minors caught crossing the border illegally.

headline.main: Oklahoma: Another Base to House Young Immigrants
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: Another Base to House Young Immigrants
